TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ImageClickEventHandler(object sender, ImageClickEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ImageClickEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ImageClickEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ImageClickEventArgs)
public delegate void ImageClickEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ImageClickEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 做為事件來源的伺服器控制項。

span.span: The server control that is the source of the event.

summary.span: 表示會處理使用者按一下影像架構 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項時所引發之任何事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles any events that are raised when a user clicks an image-based ASP.NET server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個委派會定義當使用者按一下為映像為基礎的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項時引發的所有按一下事件需要的簽章。This delegate defines the required signature for all click events raised when a user clicks an image-based ASP.NET server control. 您必須使用簽章定義此委派任何`OnServerClick`為您建立的事件處理常式伺服器控制項或任何`OnClick`為您建立的事件處理常式Web 伺服器控制項。You must use the signature defined by this delegate for any `OnServerClick` event handlers that you create for an server control or any `OnClick` event handlers that you create for an Web server control. 如果您建立的自訂映像式 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項，使用者可以按一下時，使用此委派來定義與使用者動作相關聯的事件。If you create a custom image-based ASP.NET server control that users can click, use this delegate to define the events associated with that user action. 如需委派和它們如何與事件互動的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about delegates and how they interact with events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如需如何引發事件的資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about how to raise events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI.ImageClickEventArgs Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI.ImageClickEventArgs Sample/CS/imageclickeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI.ImageClickEventArgs Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI.ImageClickEventArgs Sample/VB/imageclickeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
